techmeme.title: Apple Vision Pro, while a remarkable piece of tech, needs updates to avoid gathering dust, and WWDC's new features like 3D "spatial photos" are modest tweaks (Kevin Roose/New York Times)
UAE-based Tenderd, which uses AI to help reduce emissions, raised $30M led by Danish firm A.P. Moller, following a Peter Thiel-backed $5.8M seed in 2019 (Fahad Abuljadayel/Bloomberg)
Apple details two Apple Intelligence models: a ~3B parameter on-device language model and a larger server-based model available with Private Cloud Compute (Apple Machine Learning Research)
Apple's OpenAI partnership took up just two minutes of its one hour and 45 minute WWDC keynote, as the company focused on its own Apple Intelligence products (Nick Turner/Bloomberg)
Raspberry Pi jumps by up to 39% on its London trading debut, hitting a £542M market cap, after pricing shares at £2.80, and expects to ship 8.4M PCs in 2024 (Stephanie Stacey/Financial Times)
